"ARKS Cards":
"Your ARKS Card is a card which you can use to give other players a little information about yourself.
To view and edit your ARKS Card, open the Main Menu, select \"Personal\", then select \"ARKS Card\"."

"Your ARKS Card has room to show off a Title composed of unlocked Title pieces, your favourite Stamp or Symbol Art, and a short comment from you.
If you set your ARKS Card to \"Viewable to All Players\", it will be viewable by any other player that wishes to see it.
